Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "New NuGet prerelease 2.13.0-beta0001 with Office 2019 support" (#907) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
This is a note that we just released Beta version of SDK with support for Office 2019: namespaces and generated classes. Please give it a try and report issues, specifying NuGet package version number.

You need to check “Include prerelease” in VS NuGet Package Manager to see **2.13.0-beta0001** version.

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Allow exponents for numeric cell values" (#901) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: Follow-up to #890 . This fixes a validation issue where numbers in exponential format were not recognised.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Number serialization does not use neutral culture" (#903) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
